title: September TV Lineup: 'Unbelievable,' 'Undone,' and 'Succession' | The Watch
description:
September is shaping up to be a great month for television. We talk about 'Unbelievable' (1:15) and 'Undone' (14:34), two shows that premiered over the weekend on Netflix and Amazon Prime, respectively. Plus, breaking down 'Succession' S2E6, "Argestes" (22:51).

Host: Chris Ryan
Guests: Kaya McMullen and Jason Concepcion

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
